topic.tls:sort: 127-139: zz divinations are not necessarily recorded after they have been proven to be true

subject.topic: 127-139: ZZ divinations are not necessarily recorded after they have been proven to be true

topic.tls:sort: emphasises prognostications that do not come true (following lead by gu yanwu). what could the motive be for fabricating divinations? the circumstance that jin affaris are noted in the end of years is not proof that they are later additions.

subject.topic: emphasises prognostications that do not come true (following lead by Gu Yanwu). What could the motive be for fabricating divinations? The circumstance that Jin affaris are noted in the end of years is not proof that they are later additions.
